hero.title: Full-Stack Development Enhanced with AI
hero.subtitle: Helping businesses build modern web & mobile apps faster.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm Duško Ličanin, a full-stack developer based in Banja Luka, specializing in modern web and mobile applications. I leverage AI-optimized workflows to accelerate development without compromising quality.
about.p2: I offer complete web development, mobile app development (iOS/Android), and custom SaaS solutions for clients. I work with React and Flutter frameworks, backed by Supabase and Firebase for scalable infrastructure.
about.p3: Whether you need a marketing website, business application, or full SaaS platform — I deliver quality code twice as fast as traditional development thanks to AI-powered tools.

featured.title: SyncBooking SaaS
featured.desc: A powerful multi-tenant platform enabling property owners to sync reservations via iCal and embed booking widgets directly into their websites.
